name: Facebook - Small but Nice Changes
description: Makes some changes to the Facebook UI. I tried to imitate Beautify Facebook for Chrome, which is often problematic and takes up a lot of processing time. This is lighter, so not as good, but has few known issues.
additional_info:
Change log:
1.0: Start point
1.1: Now compatible with FF4. Fixed some bugs with groups and apps.
2.0: Made li.uiStreamStory elements (the status updates, ect) look a lot nicer. Added !important to the end of every line, just to be safe.
2.1: Improved the photo viewer and dialogue boxes (slightly).
2.2: Made code more efficient (less selectors).
Converted from old -webkit-gradient() to new-style -webkit-linear-gradient() (same as -moz-linear-gradient(), more standard).
Side headings have new gradient.
Possible other things I have forgotten.
3.0: New Facebook layout changed a lot of things. Some improvements and some maintenance.
3.1: Update to keep in line with style at Stylebot.me. Incorporates many changes due to changes on the site.
4.0: Brought into line with the Stylebot.me version.
5.0: As above.
5.1: Fixed left column.
5.2: Fixed content column width.

discussions.name: The only decent facebook theme in existance!
